quotes.quote: Whatever the mind of man can conceive and believe, it can achieve.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: Strive not to be a success, but rather to be of value.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Definiteness of purpose is the starting point of all achievement.
quotes.author: W. Clement Stone

quotes.quote: The best revenge is massive success.
quotes.author: Frank Sinatra

quotes.quote: Eighty percent of success is showing up.
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.quote: A person who never made a mistake never tried anything new.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: If you want to lift yourself up, lift up someone else.
quotes.author: Booker T. Washington

quotes.quote: Build your own dreams, or someone else will hire you to build theirs.
quotes.author: Farrah Gray

quotes.quote: Dream big and dare to fail.
quotes.author: Norman Vaughan

quotes.quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: If you can dream it, you can achieve it.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success. If you love what you are doing, you will be successful.
quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.quote: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Opportunities don't happen. You create them.
quotes.author: Chris Grosser

quotes.quote: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.quote: Don’t watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
quotes.author: Sam Levenson

quotes.quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: The harder you work for something, the greater you’ll feel when you achieve it.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Dreams don’t work unless you do.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow is our doubts of today.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Success is not how high you have climbed, but how you make a positive difference to the world.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The only limit to your impact is your imagination and commitment.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: Success is stumbling from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: The harder you work, the luckier you get.
quotes.author: Gary Player

quotes.quote: Success doesn't just find you. You have to go out and get it.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Don’t be pushed around by the fears in your mind. Be led by the dreams in your heart.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: The best revenge is massive success.
quotes.author: Frank Sinatra

quotes.quote: Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: I find that the harder I work, the more luck I seem to have.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: You miss 100% of the shots you don’t take.
quotes.author: Wayne Gretzky

quotes.quote: The most difficult thing is the decision to act, the rest is merely tenacity.
quotes.author: Amelia Earhart

quotes.quote: Every strike brings me closer to the next home run.
quotes.author: Babe Ruth

quotes.quote: Fall seven times and stand up eight.
quotes.author: Japanese Proverb

quotes.quote: You can never cross the ocean until you have the courage to lose sight of the shore.
quotes.author: Christopher Columbus

quotes.quote: If you want your children to turn out well, spend twice as much time with them, and half as much money.
quotes.author: Abigail Van Buren

quotes.quote: The battles that count aren’t the ones for gold medals. The struggles within yourself—the invisible battles inside all of us—that’s where it’s at.
quotes.author: Jesse Owens

quotes.quote: You may be disappointed if you fail, but you are doomed if you don’t try.
quotes.author: Beverly Sills

quotes.quote: When everything seems to be going against you, remember that the airplane takes off against the wind, not with it.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: Courage is being scared to death but saddling up anyway.
quotes.author: John Wayne

quotes.quote: Perseverance is not a long race; it is many short races one after the other.
quotes.author: Walter Elliot

quotes.quote: Don’t let what you cannot do interfere with what you can do.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.quote: The difference between a successful person and others is not a lack of strength, not a lack of knowledge, but rather a lack in will.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.quote: We must embrace pain and burn it as fuel for our journey.
quotes.author: Kenji Miyazawa

quotes.quote: Success is going from failure to failure without losing your enthusiasm.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: It always seems impossible until it’s done.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: If you are going through hell, keep going.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: In the face of adversity, we have to choose whether to give up or fight.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow is our doubts of today.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Courage is not the absence of fear, but the triumph over it.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: You have within you right now, everything you need to deal with whatever the world can throw at you.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: The only way to achieve the impossible is to believe it is possible.
quotes.author: Charles Kingsleigh

quotes.quote: When you come to the end of your rope, tie a knot and hang on.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: You can’t cross the sea merely by standing and staring at the water.
quotes.author: Rabindranath Tagore

quotes.quote: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: He who is brave is free.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: In the middle of every difficulty lies opportunity.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: I attribute my success to this: I never gave or took any excuse.
quotes.author: Florence Nightingale

quotes.quote: The mind is everything. What you think you become.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can.
quotes.author: Arthur Ashe

quotes.quote: Limitations live only in our minds. But if we use our imaginations, our possibilities become limitless.
quotes.author: Jamie Paolinetti

quotes.quote: Our lives begin to end the day we become silent about things that matter.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.quote: You must be the change you wish to see in the world.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Success is not the absence of failure; it’s the persistence through failure.
quotes.author: Aisha Tyler

quotes.quote: Change is the end result of all true learning.
quotes.author: Leo Buscaglia

quotes.quote: We can’t become what we need to be by remaining what we are.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Self-belief and hard work will always earn you success.
quotes.author: Virat Kohli

quotes.quote: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.quote: You don’t have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: You miss 100% of the shots you don’t take.
quotes.author: Wayne Gretzky

quotes.quote: Your life does not get better by chance, it gets better by change.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: It is never too late to be what you might have been.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: You are confined only by the walls you build yourself.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: If you want to lift yourself up, lift up someone else.
quotes.author: Booker T. Washington

quotes.quote: Every accomplishment starts with the decision to try.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Small daily improvements over time lead to stunning results.
quotes.author: Robin Sharma

quotes.quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow is our doubts of today.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Life isn’t about getting and having, it’s about giving and being.
quotes.author: Kevin Kruse

quotes.quote: Life is what happens to you while you’re busy making other plans.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.quote: We become what we think about.
quotes.author: Earl Nightingale

quotes.quote: Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things that you didn’t do than by the ones you did do, so throw off the bowlines, sail away from safe harbor, catch the trade winds in your sails. Explore, Dream, Discover.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Life is 10% what happens to me and 90% of how I react to it.
quotes.author: Charles Swindoll

quotes.quote: The most common way people give up their power is by thinking they don’t have any.
quotes.author: Alice Walker

quotes.quote: An unexamined life is not worth living.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.quote: The two most important days in your life are the day you are born and the day you find out why.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: It’s not the years in your life that count. It’s the life in your years.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Remember no one can make you feel inferior without your consent.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: It is not what you do for your children, but what you have taught them to do for themselves, that will make them successful human beings.
quotes.author: Ann Landers

quotes.quote: The only true wisdom is in knowing you know nothing.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.quote: Life is either a daring adventure or nothing at all.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: Happiness is not something you postpone for the future; it is something you design for the present.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act, but a habit.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: The best way to find yourself is to lose yourself in the service of others.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Life is short, and it is up to you to make it sweet.
quotes.author: Sarah Louise Delany

quotes.quote: Do not dwell in the past, do not dream of the future, concentrate the mind on the present moment.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: The best way out is always through.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: The real voyage of discovery consists not in seeking new landscapes, but in having new eyes.
quotes.author: Marcel Proust

quotes.quote: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Go confidently in the direction of your dreams. Live the life you have imagined.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: When I stand before God at the end of my life, I would hope that I would not have a single bit of talent left and could say, I used everything you gave me.
quotes.author: Erma Bombeck

quotes.quote: Happiness is not something readymade. It comes from your own actions.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: Life is not measured by the number of breaths we take, but by the moments that take our breath away.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: When one door of happiness closes, another opens, but often we look so long at the closed door that we do not see the one that has been opened for us.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: If you look at what you have in life, you’ll always have more. If you look at what you don’t have in life, you’ll never have enough.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: Remember that not getting what you want is sometimes a wonderful stroke of luck.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: Happiness is not by chance, but by choice.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: The purpose of life is not to be happy. It is to be useful, to be honorable, to be compassionate, to have it make some difference that you have lived and lived well.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: The best way to cheer yourself is to try to cheer someone else up.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: To live a creative life, we must lose our fear of being wrong.
quotes.author: Joseph Chilton Pearce

quotes.quote: Happiness is an inside job. Don’t assign anyone else that much power over your life.
quotes.author: Mandy Hale

quotes.quote: Happiness depends upon ourselves.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: Be happy for this moment. This moment is your life.
quotes.author: Omar Khayyam

quotes.quote: You do not find the happy life. You make it.
quotes.author: Camilla E. Kimball

quotes.quote: Happiness is not something you find, it’s something you create.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The happiness of your life depends upon the quality of your thoughts.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: The most wasted of days is one without laughter.
quotes.author: E.E. Cummings

quotes.quote: Happiness is a direction, not a place.
quotes.author: Sydney J. Harris

quotes.quote: Happiness is the highest good.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: The most important thing is to enjoy your life – to be happy – it’s all that matters.
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.quote: Happiness is when what you think, what you say, and what you do are in harmony.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Happiness is not the absence of problems, it’s the ability to deal with them.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: The purpose of life is to be happy.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: Happiness is not about getting all you want, it’s about enjoying all you have.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Every child is an artist. The problem is how to remain an artist once he grows up.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote: If you hear a voice within you say “you cannot paint,” then by all means paint and that voice will be silenced.
quotes.author: Vincent Van Gogh

quotes.quote: You can’t use up creativity. The more you use, the more you have.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: I would rather die of passion than of boredom.
quotes.author: Vincent van Gogh

quotes.quote: Nothing is impossible, the word itself says, “I’m possible!”
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.quote: Creativity is intelligence having fun.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Every artist dips his brush in his own soul, and paints his own nature into his pictures.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: Passion is the genesis of genius.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: Creativity is the power to connect the seemingly unconnected.
quotes.author: William Plomer

quotes.quote: Art is the most beautiful of lies that reveal the truth.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote: Creativity takes courage.
quotes.author: Henri Matisse

quotes.quote: The artist is not a different kind of person, but every person is a different kind of artist.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Passion is the fuel, the fire that makes us move forward.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The chief enemy of creativity is good sense.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote: Creativity is allowing yourself to make mistakes. Art is knowing which ones to keep.
quotes.author: Scott Adams

quotes.quote: Creativity is intelligence having fun.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Passion is the fuel, the fuel that drives us to take action.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Creativity is allowing yourself to make mistakes. Art is knowing which ones to keep.
quotes.author: Scott Adams

quotes.quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: Imagination is more important than knowledge. For knowledge is limited, whereas imagination embraces the entire world, stimulating progress, giving birth to evolution.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: You can’t use up creativity. The more you use, the more you have.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: The chief enemy of creativity is good sense.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote: Every artist was first an amateur.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Creativity is the power to connect the seemingly unconnected.
quotes.author: William Plomer

quotes.quote: Passion is energy. Feel the power that comes from focusing on what excites you.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey
